original_text: And as if this were not enough in your sight, my God, you have spoken about the future of the house of your servant. You, Lord God, have looked on me as though I were the most exalted of men.
korean_text: 하나님이여 주께서 이것을 오히려 작게 여기시고 또 종의 집에 대하여 먼 장래까지 말씀하셨사오니 여호와 하나님이여 나를 존귀한 자들 같이 여기셨나이다

sentences.original_text: And as if this were not enough in your sight
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것이 당신의 보시기에 충분하지 않은 것처럼

sentences.original_text: you have spoken about the future of the house of your servant
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 종의 집의 미래에 대해 말씀하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: as though I were the most exalted of men
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 내가 가장 높은 사람인 것처럼
